alert.note: Alert for Southwest Wyoming (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 3:37PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Rich... northwestern Summit and west central Uinta Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 337 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Evanston, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Evanston, Almy and Wahsatch. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Wyoming between mile markers 1 and 7. Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 187 and 196. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
